channel.title: Using "say" command in SP closes game
channel.description:
Using the "say" command in Single Player closes the game immediately. Not even sure if that's really a "crash" or not. You may wonder why I want to say something in SP? I keep the command "say ^_^" bound to mouse3 for multiplayer and I pressed it accidentally. I didn't test if this happens in Windows too.
Update: this happens for me on Windows and Linux.
